Package utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Utils
  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class which contains common and universal functions which are not specific to any class.

                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Searches and Returns file inside a particular directory.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file needs to be searched.
        dirName - directory in which file needs to be searched.
        Returns:
        File object of that found file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the directory doesn't exist or file not found.

      • compareDates

        public static int compareDates​(java.lang.String date1,
                               java.lang.String date2)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns -1 if date1 less tha date2. 1 if date1 greater than date2 0 if date1 = date2
        Parameters:
        date1 - date1
        date2 - date2
        Returns:
        {-1,0,1}
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if invalid date
        java.lang.Exception
